entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
